Key Match Events: The game had the most up and down lead changes I can remember, it was pretty wild.
Nick Castellanos’ walk-off single gave the Phillies a 7-6 win.
Mark Vientos and Pete Alonso hit two home runs each for the Mets.
Pre-Game Insights: The series between the two geographical and National League East rivals will resume in New York on Tuesday afternoon tied at 1 in the best-of-5 format.
I imagine it’s going to be pretty hostile and a lot of fun,” said Phillies first baseman Bryce Harper. “Really looking forward to that.
Post-Match Reflections: “Definitely an emotional roller coaster of a game. so many ups and down,” said Phillies catcher J.T. Realmuto.
The Mets manager Carlos Mendoza noted it was because of the Phillies’ talent and perseverance that the series is heading to New York tied.
“They’re a really good ballclub, and they don’t quit. The whole second half they just grinded out (at-bats).”
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 2024 Mets continue to have so many 2022 Phillies vibes, it’s like they are twins.
Both teams rallied in the second half of the season after slow starts.
Others: The series moves to New York, which could have an atmosphere that rivals what has become known as the most raucous in baseball at Citizens Bank Park.
